charges.charge_disposition: Dft sentenced to custody of Bureau of Prisons 300 months as to count one and 84 months as to count two; count two shall be served consecutively to any other previously imposed sentence; dft ordered to make restitution in the amount of $68,794.75 due immediately to Commercial Federal Bank; S/A fee $200 due immediately;

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)(1)(A)(ii) BRANDISHING A FIREARM DURING A ROBBERY(2)
